Title: Introduction
Content:
ContentsJS is a non linear approach of presenting arbitrary information. Other than normal texts the idea is to give the user more possibility to gather information in documents / written stuff. This is done by presenting small [Patches] which contain [Keywords]. Read more about the [Motivation] of ContentsJS or read on [how to use it]

[Patches]: #patches
[Keywords]: #keywords
[Motivation]: #motivation
[how to use it]: #usage
Author: Maximilian Klein
